MoviesDescription: One of the best-made prequel series of all time. The minimal and color accurate cinematography follows through this one as well. Don't miss it if you're a big Breaking Bad fan and love Saul's character.

This movie was on my list for the longest time but got the push to watch it after watching the Netflix series on Luka Magnotta, a serial killer fascinated by stories of Catch me if you can and Basic Instinct.

MoviesName: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
MoviesDescription: Sam Raimi, the director of the movie overdid the horror part. The movie didn't feel like the typical light-hearted Marvel movie that I go to theaters for.
Okish direction. Watched it only for Keanu Reeves.
The story telling & acting by Jared Leto & Anne Hathaway is on point. A MUST WATCH if you're interested in either well documented stories & startups.
Marvel's best multiverse movie so far as it was able to pull off the unimaginable task of brining all previous Spiderman & their counterparts in one movie. Very well executed storyline.
Loved the fact that it didn't have an all-star cast back then and still all the actors felt perfect for their roles. The action sequences were directed to feel real 100%.

MoviesName: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
MoviesDescription: Binge watched this amazing series during my college days. VFX in battles were just mindblowing for its time.

MoviesName: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
MoviesDescription: Binge watched this amazing series during my college days. Loved all Gandalf - The white scenes in this one.

MoviesName: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
MoviesDescription: Binge watched this amazing series during my college days. The bond between Fordo and Sam was very well depicted.
